name: Tomato-Mozzarella Gratin
author: Charlotte
summary: A great dish for tomato and mozzarella lovers - you can easily scale it up if you are serving a lot of people. Great side for parties or BBQs, as it tastes great at room temperature as well.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) ball fresh mozzarella cheese, thinly sliced
½ teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste
½ teaspoon garlic powder, or to taste
1 pinch herb salt, or to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste
2 tablespoons butter at room temperature, cut into cubes
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste
directions: Preheat the oven to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C)
Arrange tomato slices and mozzarella slices in the prepared baking dish like tiles
Season with oregano, garlic powder, herb salt, and pepper
Mix bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese and sprinkle over gratin
Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted and bubbly, about 10 minutes
